choose.when: FID, FAPPL_FUNC_NAME, FAPPL_FUNC_CODE, FAPPL_FUNC_TYPE, FAPPL_ID, FFUNC_ID, FPARENT_ID, FENABLE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FTARGET, FICON, FURL, FACTION, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_appl_func
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_appl_func where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_appl_func (FID, FAPPL_FUNC_NAME, FAPPL_FUNC_CODE, FAPPL_FUNC_TYPE, FAPPL_ID, FFUNC_ID, FPARENT_ID, FENABLE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FTARGET, FICON, FURL, FACTION, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applFuncName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applFuncCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applFuncType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
